text: is a town located in Okhotsk Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of September 2016, the town has an estimated population of 11,897 and a population density of 16 persons per km². The total area is 736.97 km². ==Notable people from Shari== *Tatsuhikari Kumagoro, former sumo ringer *Tsutomu Takebe, politician == Climate == ==References== ==External links== * *Official Website Category:Towns in Hokkaido
title: Shari, Hokkaido
